class  Ellipse

Detailed Description

Properties of a region such as geometric (centroid, area, etc) and physical (based on other grid values).

Author:
v.lakshmanan

00113                                                                               {
00114         RegionProperty[] props = new RegionProperty[label.maxlabel+1];
00115         for (int i=1; i < props.length; ++i){
00116             props[i] = new RegionProperty();
00117         }
00118         int nrows = label.label.getNumLat();
00119         int ncols = label.label.getNumLon();
00120         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00121             if (label.label.getValue(i,j) > 0){
00122                 props[ label.label.getValue(i,j) ].update(i, j, data.getValue(i,j));
00123             }
00124         }
00125         return props;
00126     }

Ellipse edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.RegionProperty.getEllipseFit (  )  

00086                                    {
00087         final double cx = xstat.getMean();
00088         final double cy = ystat.getMean();
00089         final double s11 = xstat.getVariance();
00090         final double s22 = ystat.getVariance();
00091         final double s12 = xystat.getMean() - cx*cy;
00092         double tmp = (s11 - s22) * (s11 - s22) + 4 * s12 * s12;
00093         if (tmp >= 0.00001) {
00094             tmp = Math.sqrt(tmp);
00095         } else {
00096             tmp = 0;
00097         }
00098         double eigen1 = (s11 + s22 + tmp) / 2;
00099         double eigen2 = (s11 + s22 - tmp) / 2;
00100         
00101         double v1 = s12
00102                 / Math.sqrt((eigen1 - s11) * (eigen1 - s11) + s12 * s12);
00103         double v2 = (eigen1 - s11)
00104                 / Math.sqrt((eigen1 - s11) * (eigen1 - s11) + s12 * s12);
00105 
00106         double a = 2 * Math.sqrt(eigen1);
00107         double b = 2 * Math.sqrt(eigen2);
00108         double phi = Math.toDegrees(Math.atan2(v2, v1));
00109         return new Ellipse(cx, cy, a, b, phi);
00110 
00111     }

static Pixel [][] edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.RegionProperty.getPixelsInRegions ( LatLonGrid  data1,
LabelResult  objects1 
) [static]

All the pixels for each region.

The array is organized as pixels[regno][pixelno]

Parameters:
data1 
objects1 
Returns:
00135                                                                                        {
00136         @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
00137         List<Pixel>[] regions = new List[objects1.maxlabel+1];
00138         for (int reg=1; reg < regions.length; ++reg){
00139             regions[reg] = new ArrayList<Pixel>();
00140         }
00141         for (int i=0; i < data1.getNumLat(); ++i) for (int j=0; j < data1.getNumLon(); ++j){
00142             int reg = objects1.label.getValue(i,j);
00143             if (reg > 0){
00144                 regions[reg].add(new Pixel(i,j,data1.getValue(i,j)));
00145             }
00146         }
00147         Pixel[][] result = new Pixel[regions.length][];
00148         for (int i=1; i < result.length; ++i){
00149             result[i] = regions[i].toArray(new Pixel[0]);
00150         }
00151         return result;
00152     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.RegionProperty.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00206                                                             {
00207         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("regionproperty");
00208         
00209         // data
00210         LatLonGrid grid = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LinearScaling()).crop(1000, 2100, 100, 200);
00211         KmlWriter.write(grid, out, "orig", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00212         
00213         // global thresh
00214         int thresh = 20;
00215         ThresholdSegmenter seg = new ThresholdSegmenter(thresh);
00216         LabelResult labelResult = seg.label(grid);
00217         labelResult.label.setMissing(-1); // to get background color
00218         KmlWriter.write(labelResult.label, out, "allcities_"+thresh, PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00219         
00220         // prune cities less than 5 pixels in size
00221         for (int sizethresh = 2; sizethresh <= 5; ++sizethresh){
00222             LabelResult pruned = pruneBySize(labelResult, grid, sizethresh);
00223             pruned.label.setMissing(-1); // to get background color
00224             KmlWriter.write(pruned.label, out, "sizepruned_"+sizethresh, PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00225             // get geocode
00226             RegionProperty[] prop = RegionProperty.compute(pruned, grid);
00227             for (int i=1; i < prop.length; ++i){
00228                 LatLon loc = grid.getLocation(prop[i].getCx(), prop[i].getCy());
00229                 UsaZipcode.Entry entry = UsaZipcode.getInstance().getEntryClosestTo(loc);
00230                 System.out.println(entry + " " + prop[i].getEllipseFit());
00231             }
00232             
00233             // there are more efficient ways to paint an ellipse, but this will do
00234             Ellipse[] ellipses = new Ellipse[prop.length];
00235             for (int i=1; i < prop.length; ++i){
00236                 ellipses[i] = prop[i].getEllipseFit();
00237             }
00238             LatLonGrid ellipse = LatLonGrid.copyOf(pruned.label);
00239             ellipse.fill(0);
00240             int nrows = ellipse.getNumLat();
00241             int ncols = ellipse.getNumLon();
00242             for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00243                 for (int k=1; k < prop.length; ++k){
00244                     if (ellipses[k].contains(i, j)){
00245                         ellipse.setValue(i, j, k); // paint pixel
00246                     }
00247                 }
00248             }
00249             KmlWriter.write(ellipse, out, "ellipse_"+sizethresh, PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00250         }
00251     }

static LabelResult edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.RegionProperty.prune ( LabelResult  input,
boolean[]  keep 
) [static]

Regions for which keep=false are removed. 

00157                                                                       {
00158         // find mapping
00159         int[] newRegionNo = new int[keep.length]; // init to zero
00160         int numRegions = 0;
00161         for (int i=1; i < keep.length; ++i){
00162             if ( keep[i] ){
00163                 ++numRegions;
00164                 newRegionNo[i] = numRegions;
00165             }
00166         }
00167         
00168         // replace old label by new label
00169         LatLonGrid newLabel = LatLonGrid.copyOf(input.label);
00170         int nrows = newLabel.getNumLat();
00171         int ncols = newLabel.getNumLon();
00172         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00173             int oldno = input.label.getValue(i,j);
00174             newLabel.setValue(i,j, newRegionNo[oldno]);
00175         }
00176         return new LabelResult(newLabel, numRegions);
00177     }

static LabelResult edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.RegionProperty.pruneBySize ( LabelResult  input,
LatLonGrid  grid,
int  sizethresh 
) [static]

Regions smaller than sizethresh are removed. 

00182                                                                                              {
00183         RegionProperty[] prop = RegionProperty.compute(input, grid);
00184         
00185         // find mapping
00186         int[] newRegionNo = new int[prop.length]; // init to zero
00187         int numRegions = 0;
00188         for (int i=1; i < prop.length; ++i){
00189             if ( prop[i].getSize() >= sizethresh ){
00190                 ++numRegions;
00191                 newRegionNo[i] = numRegions;
00192             }
00193         }
00194         
00195         // replace old label by new label
00196         LatLonGrid newLabel = LatLonGrid.copyOf(input.label);
00197         int nrows = newLabel.getNumLat();
00198         int ncols = newLabel.getNumLon();
00199         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00200             int oldno = input.label.getValue(i,j);
00201             newLabel.setValue(i,j, newRegionNo[oldno]);
00202         }
00203         return new LabelResult(newLabel, numRegions);
00204     }
